definition: to erect (a tent etc)/to prick up (one's ears)/to raise (one's eyebrows)/to stick up (one's thumb)/to turn up (one's collar)/(of a bird) to puff up (one's feathers)
vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
to pick on sth incessantly (idiom)/to criticize right and left
pinyin: heng2 tiao1 bi2 zi5 shu4 tiao1 yan3

definition: to lie down all over the place/exhausted and in disarray
to explain sth over and over again/to repeat

sentences.english: The horse's ears cocked up immediately.
The dog cocked its ears suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 這條狗忽然把耳朵豎起來。

sentences.english: The horse cocked its ears up several seconds before I could hear anything.
sentences.chinese: 馬把耳朵豎了起來，幾秒鐘後，我才聽到聲音。

sentences.english: Let me smooth your collar back, it's sticking out again.
sentences.chinese: 讓我把你的領子給你放平，又豎起來了。

sentences.english: At the end of the day the foreman asked the first crew how many poles they had done.
sentences.chinese: 一天工作結束的時候，工頭問第一組工人豎了多少根。

sentences.english: Erected in the center circle with a vertical bar disk.
sentences.chinese: 在圓周的圓心豎一根與盤面垂直的直杆。

sentences.english: Above them is a frame of beams and double wood columns.
sentences.chinese: 上面是一系列懸樑框架和豎着的雙排木柱。

sentences.english: The vertical angle refers to the difference between the vertical readings.
sentences.chinese: 豎直角則是兩個方向的豎盤讀數之差。

sentences.english: The hairs on the back of my neck prickled with fear.
sentences.chinese: 脖梗兒的汗毛都豎起來了。

sentences.english: The voice of ground crack comes from Shu's the son in the vacant land medium.
sentences.chinese: 碎裂的聲音，來自豎在空地中間的那根木頭樁子。

sentences.english: I've finished the crossword apart from 3 across and 10 down.
sentences.chinese: 這份縱橫字謎除橫3豎10以外我都填完了。

sentences.english: Let's just read the it horizontally and write it vertically.
sentences.chinese: 我們就是橫着讀，豎着寫。

sentences.english: Like a middle finger in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 就像是歐洲的豎中指手勢一樣。

sentences.english: They did right to put him up over a urinal : meeting of the waters.
sentences.chinese: 他們把他這座銅像豎在一座小便池上，倒是做對了。

sentences.english: The dog 's hair bristled up at the stranger.
sentences.chinese: 狗見到陌生人毛都豎起來了。

sentences.english: On the pavement outside, there are a handful of basketball hoops and a set of rusty metal parallel bars.
sentences.chinese: 教室外面的操場豎着幾個籃球架和生鏽的金屬雙槓。

definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to bend/bent/a bend/a turn (in the road etc)/CL:道[dao4]
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
perfectly straight/straight as a ramrod/bolt upright
left/the left side/to the left of
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
